Text: Error while trying it in H2...error unable to read disc..the disc burn fine with no erros
I burned this per instructions in the torrent and my Chevy Silverado 2010 would not recognize the disk as a valid map disk when I inserted it.
Burned with no errors but my Silverado doesn't recognize it as a valid map disk.
Works great! Your burner has to support changing the book type to DVD-ROM before burning.. otherwise it won't work. Working great in my '07 Tahoe!

Thank you for the share it works perfect.  I used a Memorex DVD+RDL, ImgBurn that's included in the file to burn the DVD with, and a fairly new Asus DVD Burner set to 2X burn speed.  I have a 2008 GMC 3500 and it updated the old maps without a hiccup.
